basics.name: Nicola Portolano
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Nicola has a bachelor degree and a Ph.D. in biochemistry and he is currently working as a research scientist. To find answers to scientific problems, he dedicates a lot of time to data analysis and engineering as well as project and experimental design. He is interested in applying his strong backround in research in the field of data science. Nicola also enjoys using Python and MySQL to aid his work, he likes socialising and is keen in learning new skills in data analysis, engineering and architecture.

work.summary: Worked in a team of chemists to find solutions to scientific problems with potential medical applications.
highlights: Extensively used scientific databases to collect data and store it in easily parsable data structures.
Analysed various types of data and applied statistics to determine experiment repetibility and significance.
Designed new projects for students and outlined experimental methods.
Presented data at an international conference in Newport, RI.
